div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2100 Cassibile, 15 km. SW of Syracuse, 1952 Burial: c. 400 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 14 AR. Pot hoard Rhegium: 1 tetradr. Catana: 2 tetradr. (1 signed ΕϒΑΙΝ as Rizzo, MGS, pl. 14, 6) Gela: 1 tetradr. Leontini: 2 tetradr. Syracuse: 8 tetradr. (to Tudeer 37, 44) Disposition: Syracuse † Gentili, NSc 1954, pp. 77-80, illus.; AIIN 1954, p. 166 Currò Pisanò, AIIN 1962-4, pp. 229, 237 Jenkins, Gela, p. 148
